meta.title: Fruit Frenzy - Clash of Juicy Champions
meta.description: Welcome to Fruit Clash – the ultimate fruit-matching battle! Slice, swap, and smash your way through vibrant levels packed with juicy action!

hero.title: Fruit Clash
hero.description: Dive into a fruity frenzy! Match delicious fruits, trigger explosive combos, and conquer juicy levels in this colorful arcade puzzle adventure.

steps.title: Pick a Challenge
steps.description: Start with simple fruit-matching puzzles and gradually unlock tougher levels bursting with flavor.

steps.title: Match & Smash
steps.description: Align three or more identical fruits to trigger combos and clear the board with satisfying bursts.

steps.title: Use Boosters
steps.description: Unlock and deploy powerful fruit boosters to clear tricky spots and gain the upper hand.

steps.title: Climb the Ranks
steps.description: Complete juicy levels to earn stars, unlock new areas, and rise through the fruity leaderboard.

testimonials.text: I can’t get enough of Fruit Clash! The levels are colorful and fun, and the combos are so satisfying to watch.
testimonials.author: Lena Thompson
testimonials.title: Arcade Fan

testimonials.text: Fruit Clash is my new go-to puzzle game. It's relaxing but still gives you that rewarding challenge!
testimonials.author: David Kim
testimonials.title: Match-3 Lover

testimonials.text: I play a lot of mobile games, but Fruit Clash really stands out. Bright visuals, cool mechanics, and zero boredom!
testimonials.author: Nina Alvarez
testimonials.title: Mobile Game Critic

items.title: Juicy Animations
items.description: Enjoy satisfying slicing effects and bursting animations every time you match fruits!

items.title: Tons of Fruit Types
items.description: From classic apples and bananas to exotic starfruit and dragon fruit – every match is a delight.

items.title: Surprising Obstacles
items.description: Break through crates, avoid slime, and outsmart frozen tiles as the levels get more exciting!

items.name: Fruit Fanatic
items.description: Matched over 1,000 fruits in a single session.

items.name: Combo King
items.description: Triggered 5 mega combos in one level.

items.name: Perfect Pick
items.description: Cleared a level without using any boosters.
